st:Description.name: DNBVNCSimulSettings
st:Description.st:role: Lists the settings used during the machine simulation in the Machining applications
st:Description.st:detailedRole: The machining simulation settings are useful to manages options used during a machine simulation

st:attribute.Name: DisplayTPInSimul
st:attribute.st:role: Defines if the tool path is shown during the machine simulation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines if the tool path is shown during the machine simulation

st:attribute.Name: DisplayTPPointInSimul
st:attribute.st:role: Defines if the points in the tool path are shown during the machine simulation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines if the points in the tool path are shown during the machine simulation

st:attribute.Name: TCPPointColor
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the points color of the tool path during the machine simulation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the points color of the tool path during the machine simulation

st:attribute.Name: TCPPointType
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the points type of the tool path during the machine simulation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the points type of the tool path during the machine simulation

st:attribute.Name: DisplayTPPathInSimul
st:attribute.st:role: Defines if the lines in the tool path are shown during the machine simulation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines if the lines in the tool path are shown during the machine simulation

st:attribute.Name: TCPLineColor
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the lines color of the tool path during the machine simulation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the lines color of the tool path during the machine simulation

st:attribute.Name: TCPPathType
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the lines type of the tool path during the machine simulation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the lines type of the tool path during the machine simulation

st:attribute.Name: TCPPathThickness
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the lines thickness of the tool path during the machine simulation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the lines thickness of the tool path during the machine simulation

st:attribute.Name: PaddingRange
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the number of segments on either side of the collision point
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the number of segments on either side of the collision point

st:attribute.Name: NCCodeSimulMode
st:attribute.st:role: Defines if material removal path is done during the machine simulation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines if material removal path is done during the machine simulation
